verses.verse: Wherefore <WG5105> seeing we also <WG2532> are <WG2192> <WG5723> compassed about <WG4029> <WG5740> <WG2254> with so great <WG5118> a cloud <WG3509> of witnesses <WG3144>, let <WG659> us <WG2249> lay aside <WG659> <WG5642> every <WG3956> weight <WG3591>, and <WG2532> the sin <WG266> which doth so easily beset <WG2139> us, and let us run <WG5143> <WG5725> with <WG1223> patience <WG5281> the race <WG73> that is set before <WG4295> <WG5740> us <WG2254>,

Looking <WG872> <WG5723> unto <WG1519> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> the author <WG747> and <WG2532> finisher <WG5051> of our faith <WG4102>; who <WG3739> for <WG473> the joy <WG5479> that was set before <WG4295> <WG5740> him <WG846> endured <WG5278> <WG5656> the execution stake <WG4716>, despising <WG2706> <WG5660> the shame <WG152>, and <WG5037> is set down <WG2523> <WG5656> at <WG1722> the right hand <WG1188> of the throne <WG2362> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> consider <WG357> <WG5663> him that endured <WG5278> <WG5761> such <WG5108> contradiction <WG485> of <WG5259> sinners <WG268> against <WG1519> himself <WG846>, lest <WG3363> ye be wearied <WG2577> <WG5632> and faint <WG1590> <WG5746> in your <WG5216> minds <WG5590>.
Ye have <WG478> not yet <WG3768> resisted <WG478> <WG5627> unto <WG3360> blood <WG129>, striving <WG464> <WG5740> against <WG4314> sin <WG266>.

And <WG2532> ye have forgotten <WG1585> <WG5769> the exhortation <WG3874> which <WG3748> speaketh <WG1256> <WG5736> unto you <WG5213> as <WG5613> unto children <WG5207>, My <WG3450> son <WG5207>, despise <WG3643> not <WG3361> thou <WG3643> <WG5720> the chastening <WG3809> of the YY <WG2962>, nor <WG3366> faint <WG1590> <WG5744> when thou art rebuked <WG1651> <WG5746> of <WG5259> him <WG846>:

For <WG1063> whom <WG3739> the YY <WG2962> loveth <WG25> <WG5719> he chasteneth <WG3811> <WG5719>, and <WG1161> scourgeth <WG3146> <WG5719> every <WG3956> son <WG5207> whom <WG3739> he receiveth <WG3858> <WG5736>.

If <WG1487> ye endure <WG5278> <WG5719> chastening <WG3809>, 'Elohim <WG2316> dealeth <WG4374> <WG5743> with you <WG5213> as <WG5613> with sons <WG5207>; for <WG1063> what <WG5101> son <WG5207> is he <WG2076> <WG5748> whom <WG3739> the father <WG3962> chasteneth <WG3811> <WG5719> not <WG3756>?

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> ye be <WG2075> <WG5748> without <WG5565> chastisement <WG3809>, whereof <WG3739> all <WG3956> are <WG1096> <WG5754> partakers <WG3353>, then <WG686> are ye <WG2075> <WG5748> bastards <WG3541>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> sons <WG5207>.

Furthermore <WG1534> <WG3303> we have had <WG2192> <WG5707> fathers <WG3962> of our <WG2257> flesh <WG4561> which corrected <WG3810> us, and <WG2532> we gave them reverence <WG1788> <WG5710>: shall we <WG5293> not <WG3756> much <WG4183> rather <WG3123> be in subjection <WG5293> <WG5691> unto the Father <WG3962> of spirits <WG4151>, and <WG2532> live <WG2198> <WG5692>?

For <WG1063> they verily <WG3303> for <WG4314> a few <WG3641> days <WG2250> chastened <WG3811> <WG5707> us after <WG2596> their own <WG846> pleasure <WG1380> <WG5723>; but <WG1161> he for <WG1909> our profit <WG4851> <WG5723>, that <WG1519> we might be partakers <WG3335> <WG5629> of his <WG846> holiness <WG41>.

Now <WG1161> no <WG3956> <WG3756> chastening <WG3809> for <WG4314> <WG3303> the present <WG3918> <WG5752> seemeth <WG1380> <WG5719> to be <WG1511> <WG5750> joyous <WG5479>, but <WG235> grievous <WG3077>: nevertheless <WG1161> afterward <WG5305> it yieldeth <WG591> <WG5719> the peaceable <WG1516> fruit <WG2590> of righteousness <WG1343> unto them which are exercised <WG1128> <WG5772> thereby <WG1223> <WG846>.
Wherefore <WG1352> lift up <WG461> <WG5657> the hands <WG5495> which hang down <WG3935> <WG5772>, and <WG2532> the feeble <WG3886> <WG5772> knees <WG1119>;

And <WG2532> make <WG4160> <WG5657> straight <WG3717> paths <WG5163> for your <WG5216> feet <WG4228>, lest that <WG3363> which is lame <WG5560> be turned out of the way <WG1624> <WG5652>; but <WG1161> let it <WG2390> rather <WG3123> be healed <WG2390> <WG5686>.
Follow <WG1377> <WG5720> peace <WG1515> with <WG3326> all <WG3956> men, and <WG2532> holiness <WG38>, without <WG5565> which <WG3739> no man <WG3762> shall see <WG3700> <WG5695> the YY <WG2962>:

Looking diligently <WG1983> <WG5723> lest <WG3361> any man <WG5100> fail <WG5302> <WG5723> of <WG575> the grace <WG5485> of 'Elohim <WG2316>; lest <WG3361> any <WG5100> root <WG4491> of bitterness <WG4088> springing <WG5453> <WG5723> up <WG507> trouble <WG1776> <WG5725> you, and <WG2532> thereby <WG1223> <WG5026> many <WG4183> be defiled <WG3392> <WG5686>;

Lest <WG3361> there be any <WG5100> fornicator <WG4205>, or <WG2228> profane person <WG952>, as <WG5613> Esav <WG2269>, who <WG3739> for <WG473> one <WG3391> morsel of meat <WG1035> sold <WG591> <WG5639> his <WG846> birthright <WG4415>.

For <WG1063> ye know <WG2467> <WG5759> how <WG3754> that afterward <WG2532> <WG3347>, when he would <WG2309> <WG5723> have inherited <WG2816> <WG5658> the b'rakhah <WG2129>, he was rejected <WG593> <WG5681>: for <WG1063> he found <WG2147> <WG5627> no <WG3756> place <WG5117> of repentance <WG3341>, though <WG2539> he sought <WG1567> it <WG846> carefully <WG1567> <WG5660> with <WG3326> tears <WG1144>.

For <WG1063> ye are <WG4334> not <WG3756> come <WG4334> <WG5754> unto the mount <WG3735> that might be touched <WG5584> <WG5746>, and <WG2532> that burned <WG2545> <WG5772> with fire <WG4442>, nor <WG2532> unto blackness <WG1105>, and <WG2532> darkness <WG4655>, and <WG2532> tempest <WG2366>,

And <WG2532> the sound <WG2279> of a shofar <WG4536>, and <WG2532> the voice <WG5456> of words <WG4487>; which <WG3739> voice they that heard <WG191> <WG5660> intreated <WG3868> <WG5662> that the word <WG3056> should <WG4369> not <WG3361> be spoken <WG4369> <WG5683> to them <WG846> any more <WG3361>:

(For <WG1063> they could <WG5342> not <WG3756> endure <WG5342> <WG5707> that which was commanded <WG1291> <WG5746>, And if so much as <WG2579> a beast <WG2342> touch <WG2345> <WG5632> the mountain <WG3735>, it shall be stoned <WG3036> <WG5701>, or <WG2228> thrust through <WG2700> <WG5701> with a dart <WG1002>:

And <WG2532> so <WG3779> terrible <WG5398> was <WG2258> <WG5713> the sight <WG5324> <WG5746>, that Mosheh <WG3475> said <WG2036> <WG5627>, I exceedingly fear <WG1630> <WG1510> <WG5748> and <WG2532> quake <WG1790>:)

But <WG235> ye are come <WG4334> <WG5754> unto mount <WG3735> Sion <WG4622>, and <WG2532> unto the city <WG4172> of the living <WG2198> <WG5723> 'Elohim <WG2316>, the heavenly <WG2032> Yerushalayim <WG2419>, and <WG2532> to an innumerable company <WG3461> of angels <WG32>,

To the general assembly <WG3831> and <WG2532> Congregation <WG1577> of the firstborn <WG4416>, which are written <WG583> <WG5772> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> to 'Elohim <WG2316> the Judge <WG2923> of all <WG3956>, and <WG2532> to the spirits <WG4151> of just men <WG1342> made perfect <WG5048> <WG5772>,

And <WG2532> to Yeshuw`a <WG2424> the mediator <WG3316> of the new <WG3501> covenant <WG1242>, and <WG2532> to the blood <WG129> of sprinkling <WG4473>, that speaketh <WG2980> <WG5723> better things <WG2909> than <WG3844> that of Hevel <WG6>.

See <WG991> <WG5720> that ye refuse <WG3868> <WG5667> not <WG3361> him that speaketh <WG2980> <WG5723>. For <WG1063> if <WG1487> they <WG1565> escaped <WG5343> <WG5627> not <WG3756> who refused him <WG3868> <WG5666> that spake <WG5537> <WG5723> on <WG1909> earth <WG1093>, much <WG4183> more <WG3123> shall not we <WG2249> escape, if we turn away from him <WG654> <WG5734> that speaketh from <WG575> heaven <WG3772>:

Whose <WG3739> voice <WG5456> then <WG5119> shook <WG4531> <WG5656> the earth <WG1093>: but <WG1161> now <WG3568> he hath promised <WG1861> <WG5766>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Yet <WG2089> once more <WG530> I <WG1473> shake <WG4579> <WG5719> not <WG3756> the earth <WG1093> only <WG3440>, but <WG235> also <WG2532> heaven <WG3772>.

And <WG1161> this word, Yet <WG2089> once more <WG530>, signifieth <WG1213> <WG5719> the removing <WG3331> of those things that are shaken <WG4531> <WG5746>, as <WG5613> of things that are made <WG4160> <WG5772>, that <WG2443> those things which cannot <WG3361> be shaken <WG4531> <WG5746> may remain <WG3306> <WG5661>.

Wherefore <WG1352> we receiving <WG3880> <WG5723> a kingdom <WG932> which cannot be moved <WG761>, let us have <WG2192> <WG5725> grace <WG5485>, whereby <WG1223> <WG3739> we may serve <WG3000> <WG5725> 'Elohim <WG2316> acceptably <WG2102> with <WG3326> reverence <WG127> and <WG2532> godly fear <WG2124>:
For <WG2532> <WG1063> our <WG2257> 'Elohim <WG2316> is a consuming <WG2654> <WG5723> fire <WG4442>.
